metadata.title: 2 Pieces 60 Minute Kitchen Timer 1 Hour Visual Kitchen Clock Timer Mini Countdown Timer Loud Voice, Mechanical Timer for Kitchen, Homework, Exercise
features: Simple operation: find 0, turn clockwise to 0 a circle, then rotate counterclockwise to the time you want to set, when the countdown finishes, the timer will send out loud clangorous bell

Humanized design: this 60 minute timer with no traditional needle design makes no loud ticking, helping you to concentrate more on what you are doing; You can see how time escapes directly through the precision dial; The large number printed on dial plant helps you to know time accurately; This 2.4 x 2.4 inch timer is designed to be small, lightweight and need no battery, so you can take it everywhere and don’t worry about it being out of power and unable to use it

Time management: it's a question that do you really know how long one hour is or how many things can be done in an hour, our timer with a precise scale can help you to see the time flies directly; This useful design will not only help the adults but also children to understand how much time is left, improving work and study efficiency

Different occasions: this 60 minute timer is suitable for any place, the simple pure color design makes it not so stand out in any environment; Great time management tool for school, homework, office, conference room and other activities; Designed for children, parents, teachers, chef, office staff and students

What will you get: you will receive 2 pieces 60 minute timers, you can put one on your desk to supervise your work, and the other in the kitchen to control the cooking time of food; It can be applied at any time, which is convenient for life, it can also be applied as a good gift to share with friends
description: 2 Pieces 60 minute kitchen timer 1 hour visual kitchen clock timer mini countdown timer loud voice, auto-off, mechanical timer for kitchen, homework, exerciseFeature:Humanized design:This 60 minute timer with no traditional needle design makes no loud ticking, helping you to concentrate more on what you are doing. You can see how time escapes directly through the precision dial. The large number printed on dial plant helps you to know time accurately. This 2.4 x 2.4 inch timer is designed to be small, lightweight and need no battery, so you can take it everywhere and don’t worry about it being out of power and unable to use it.Closest partner: While you are extremely busy in the kitchen, our kitchen timer can be your closet partner, remind you what to do next, great for different uses in cooking in the kitchen. No worry that boiled water will be dried up and dishes burnt.Specification:Material: plastic and metalSize: as the pictures showColor: as the pictures showQuantity: 2 piecesPackage includes:2 x 60 Minute timersNote:Please allow a little error on the size due to manual measurement.The color might exist slightly difference due to different displays.
